m_szDocTitle: An Economic Forecast for the European Union - The New York Times
m_szDocSumamry: textArticle -------------------- The New York Times Business Day |An Economic Forecast for the European Union Advertisement Business Day | The Week Ahead An Economic Forecast for the European Union By THE NEW YORK TIMES MAY 1, 2016 This is what to expect from the week ahead: ECONOMY Taking the pulse of the eurozone. Tuesday morning, the European Commission will announce its spring economic forecast for growth and employment across the 28 member states of the European Union. The forecast may also shed light on whether the long-awaited recovery in the eurozone may finally be consolidating and on
